reviewText: Yes, this video is adolescent and sophomoric in nature. Yet, it does the trick of making vocabulary building fun and makes you laugh at the same time. My son who is 17 has viewed this more than once, probably three times and would given some passage of time rewatch the episodes again. There is also a disc with printable exercises that reinforces the meaning of the words. We both enjoyed viewing them.

My two boys, in the early 20s, and I watched the first chapter.  It was sophomoric and was not presented in a manner that encouraged you to learn.  Suggest using the new online Thesaurus.com Word Dynamo.  So far it is free and much better.
